I was going to download this book but after reading all you guys comments think i'll give it a miss. Both Israel and Palastine are as bad as each other, I disagree with the tretment of Palistinians by the Jew Army(ISAF i think their called, a bit like a Jew french foreign legion)and the fact we(the UN)dont recognise it as an independant state. But at the same time the Palistinians dont do themselves any favours with the violence promulgated on their side(although being Scottish I can sympathise with feeling the need to figh for freedom). The truth is, the Judaism established by Moses is nothing to do with the Judaism existing today, which is so polluted with mysticism and man made theology. Id say whats the use in all the viloence, but the bible says its to continue right up till the end, so whats the use.
